author: William Ebbs
title: ‘This is Going to Get Bad,’ Surgeon General Warns as U.S. Coronavirus Cases Hit 46,000
description: America's coronavirus outbreak is going to get worse, U.S. surgeon general Jerome Adams warns as confirmed cases soar above 40,000. The post ‘This is Going to Get Bad,’ Surgeon General Warns as U.S. Coronavirus Cases Hit 46,000 appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Americas coronavirus outbreak is going to get much worse this week, according to Surgeon General Jerome Adams.
  • The leading doctor believes many Americans are not taking adequate precautions as the disease begins to spread out of control.
